trans-unit.source: Defines an attribute that specifies the scope where a <see cref="T:System.Web.Configuration.FolderLevelBuildProvider" /> object should be applied when a resource is located.
The <xref:System.Web.Configuration.FolderLevelBuildProvider> class parses and generates code during compilation for a resource that has a specific file.
trans-unit.target: La <xref:System.Web.Configuration.FolderLevelBuildProvider> classe analyse et génère le code pendant la compilation pour une ressource qui comporte un fichier spécifique.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Compilation.FolderLevelBuildProviderAppliesToAttribute> attribute defines the location scope for which the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.FolderLevelBuildProvider> object will be called.
trans-unit.target: Le <xref:System.Web.Compilation.FolderLevelBuildProviderAppliesToAttribute> attribut définit la portée de l’emplacement pour lequel le <xref:System.Web.Configuration.FolderLevelBuildProvider> objet sera appelé.

trans-unit.source: By setting the <xref:System.Web.Compilation.FolderLevelBuildProviderAppliesToAttribute> attribute, you can limit a <xref:System.Web.Configuration.FolderLevelBuildProvider> object to certain [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] directories, such as App_Code.
trans-unit.target: En définissant le <xref:System.Web.Compilation.FolderLevelBuildProviderAppliesToAttribute> attribut, vous pouvez limiter un <xref:System.Web.Configuration.FolderLevelBuildProvider> de l’objet à certains [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] annuaires, tels que App_Code.

trans-unit.source: If you do not apply a <xref:System.Web.Compilation.FolderLevelBuildProviderAppliesToAttribute> attribute to a <xref:System.Web.Configuration.FolderLevelBuildProvider> class, by default, the attribute targets all directories.
trans-unit.target: Si vous n’appliquez pas une <xref:System.Web.Compilation.FolderLevelBuildProviderAppliesToAttribute> attribut un <xref:System.Web.Configuration.FolderLevelBuildProvider> (classe), par défaut, l’attribut cible tous les répertoires.

trans-unit.source: The target directory that a <see cref="T:System.Web.Configuration.FolderLevelBuildProvider" /> object applies to.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Compilation.FolderLevelBuildProviderAppliesToAttribute" /> class.
Gets or sets the target directory that a <see cref="T:System.Web.Configuration.FolderLevelBuildProvider" /> object applies to.
The directory that a <see cref="T:System.Web.Configuration.FolderLevelBuildProvider" /> object applies to.
trans-unit.target: Le répertoire qui un <see cref="T:System.Web.Configuration.FolderLevelBuildProvider" /> objet s’applique.
